activities: PowerLinks collects personal data from prospective customers, partners and employees located in the EU who may be interested in a business relationship with PowerLinks via visits to the website, web forms, telephone calls, emails, written correspondence, 3rd party providers and other means. PowerLinks uses this information to provide services to its existing or potential customers, partners and employees located in the EU and to ensure compliance with statutory and regulatory bodies and to perform its own human resources functions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: European Union Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
